title: New skin: Beekeeper Singed bumbles onto the Rift

replies.body: "We fucked up pretty bad so instead of saying that we'll just release a tiny post containing nothing and hope everyone else shows it around and release the skin with almost no announcement and pray that people didn't notice how badly we screwed up on this"
Curious, what did they screw up on exactly?
i think the skin got delayed?{{item:3345}}

Riot HQ: "Oh shit people are playing singed now"
"WE NEED A NEW SKIN"
"SUCK THE WALLETS OF THOSE SINGED MAINS DRY"
should've been 'zookeeper singed' bcs u know, solo queue is a zoo.
This Skin is originally made from a private person who uploaded it to a community fanbase who you can play ingame in LoL  selfmade skins , maybe 4/5 years ago.
Is this legacy? The skin appears if you select "Limited Availability" in the store.
(sigh) Looks like hextech singed won't cut it anymore, now shut up and take my money
